website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular Pusheen dolls. Her brightly-colored unicorn theme is a favorite among Pusheen fans.
pros: The popular internet cat comic character as Pusheenicorn
Has earned praise for her colorful mane and tail
cons: A few rare complaints of subpar workmanship resulting in tears and damage to the doll

customer_reviews.title: nice one!
customer_reviews.text: I am a grown man with a beard and a mortgage. I do not understand this "Pusheen" of which the children speak. Still, my 12 year old daughter really loved this and still plays with it from time to time (even though she's outgrown almost all other stuffed animals). Also, unicorns and rainbows are pretty awesome; I am secure enough in my masculinity to admit this. So, five-of-five stars! Nice plush toy!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a birthday gift for a 4 yr old. Pros: it's super cute, a good size for sleeping with, soft and seems to be stiched well. Cons the blue, yellow and pink hair sheds (hopefully it's just a few loose pieces but only time will tell) and there are a few pieces of fabric and thread sticking out that will need to be cut off. Other then those few cons it's a brilliant stuffed toy for kids or adults who like cute things.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: My 10-year-old daughter loved her Pusheenicorn
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year-old daughter loved her Pusheenicorn. It is the perfect size not too big not too small. I would say it is about the size of a watermelon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size only somewhat accurate.
customer_reviews.text: First off, I took a star off, because from feet to tip of horn, it is 8”. But the width from head to tip of EXTENDED tail is 13”. So that’s the trick they play on you. So that’s a little disappointing. But Pusheenacorn is velvety soft, so is the tail. That is stuffed also. Face and stripes at top of head are embroidered on, whiskers are a felt like material, the horn is soft and stuffed, not sure what material the horn is made of, but I think it is polyester. But overall, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: only super duper soft and of great quality
customer_reviews.text: These Gund Pusheenicorn's are exactly as pictured, only super duper soft and of great quality. They are worth the cost. My daughter has several of these and we continue to buy them as gifts for children in her class at birthday time etc.
customer_reviews.author: kelly whitehead

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed...I thought this would be the size of a small pillow, but it's not. When they measure 13" it's not the size of the body but from the rainbow (including the inch the rainbow sticks out on the bottom), so the actual body is 10 inches across. You can't use this as a pillow or backrest type of pillow at all. It would look nice as a decoration on a small shelf. It's not the size of a watermelon as someone posted, but more like a canetelope or honey-dew, or a small soccer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels1234

customer_reviews.title: Mine is authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Received an authentic Pusheenicorn. I was losing sleep over whether or not I was going to get a real one or those knockoffs I kept seeing being posted. It's a sad time we live in where there are people making fake Pusheenicorns that may possibly end up on at the front door of a soon to be extremely disappointed child and frustrated parent. I hope a successful fortune to the rest hunting for a real happy unicorn kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Keith C

customer_reviews.title: Communicative Seller, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Pusheen product. As described and great size for the price. I thought I needed to return and the seller was very accommodating. I ended up canceling the return (luckily I hadn’t mailed it back yet) and I’m glad the processing worked out. I will purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat, California

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy/Good Storage.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter so she can put her excess blankets and stuffed animals in it. She LOVES it! She’s seven years d and she filled it herself and she sits on it to do crafts or watch TV. It’s a great storage idea and multi-purpose. Since she loved it so much I bought three more for my other grandchildren and one for our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pusheen!
customer_reviews.text: What is their not to love about Pusheen! My 10 yr old Daughter absolutely loves her Pusheens! She has a collection of 4 different Pusheens and she will not go to bed at night without each and everyone of them! These are well made stuffies that hold up well and her oldest (3yr old) one looks just as new as the day she received it, and believe me they get hugged and hugged!
customer_reviews.author: niKoLs

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS VERY ADORABLE UNICORN PUSHEEN KITTY CAT!!!! I purchased this whimsical~great quality material item for our home. It arrived promptly and in excellent condition! It was very well packaged! IT IS SO CUTE AND LOVELY! Life is to short not to have rated G fun :) !!!!! It is well worth the price! I give this unique item 5 stars 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: vanmieghem

customer_reviews.title: Delightful Gift!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter as a birthday gift. She absolutely loves it. This is a typical high-quality GUND toy - it's very soft and of excellent quality. Our daughter especially loves that its called Pusheenicorn and this purchase also caused her to spend a bit of her birthday money on two other Pusheens for her collection.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiBrandow

customer_reviews.title: Pusheenicorn Attacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little cutie for a pseudo travel/airplane pillow. He worked as a pillow and then while we stayed at the hotel he also worked as a cuddley stuffed animal to sleep with. He is well made and an original (not a knockoff). I just love squishing him and chasing my pets around as Pusheenicorn attacks them! (I wish I had pictures!)
customer_reviews.author: (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ Ebee

customer_reviews.title: Softest, cutest plushie!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 14 year old daughter for Christmas. it is so unbelievably soft that you never want to put it down she's lucky I didn't keep it! It's wonderful and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: very adorable
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, its big though i feel the hair of the plush will fall off but that was expected when made the purchase. Its super cute and am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gag for the wife and she likes to always have it in reach when she's curled up in bed marathon watching her f
customer_reviews.text: I only wish they made these larger. Hilarious, cute and comforting. I bought this as a gag for the wife and she likes to always have it in reach when she's curled up in bed marathon watching her favorite shows. It fits great where normal pillows may not, like that unsupported spot of your neck where a pillow would make it too hot or uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ryan

customer_reviews.title: cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Once again, Pusheenicorn is the cutest around. My daughter loved this from the moment she opened the package. I have to say it is so adorable, soft and just plain cute.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!! Buy at your own risk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST quality stuffed animal EVER! I purchased this for my daughter and upon arrival noticed it was HORRIBLE quality and NOTHING like the photo description! The rainbow "hair" is totally cheap and awful and for some reason there is a huge gap between 2 of the colors. The item you get looks NOTHING like the picture in the description! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Philpott

customer_reviews.title: Belated review
customer_reviews.text: I have forgotten to review quite a few things that I don't even remember buying this. I'm going to assume I bought it for someone in my family and they properly like it alot. Forgive me for the belated review.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute, and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my daughters birthday. She is absolutely in love with it. It's soft, cute, and affordable. We will be buying more Pusheen products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 5 year old. She thinks it's a small pillow. She loves the softness and it's very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great as a stuffed animal, or as a snuggle pillow. Super soft, and seems to be durable. Didn't look like it, but has held up pretty well this far. Little one was extremely excited for her Pusheenicorn.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jammin

customer_reviews.title: Official Pusheen, Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My girls are huge Pusheen fans. I got this one for my 9 year old and she absolutely loves it! I was impressed with its size. You can use it as a pillow. It is very soft and well made. Now she wants more. Its so snuggly even the cat likes it.
customer_reviews.author: FlippinPancakes

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at the Holiday party
customer_reviews.text: Used as a gift exchange/mystery swap and when it was opened, about 3 of the 5 people gasped and tried to swap/”steal”.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this zero stars. This is a counterfeit product. Item is not as described. It is not the 13" toy described, it is actually half that size, and is not even the right colors.
customer_reviews.author: anchor_doll

customer_reviews.title: Pristine & brand new toy
customer_reviews.text: Soft, adorable Pusheen. Great gift for my niece, who told me A. She loves Pusheen now, and B. Unicorns are her spirit animal. No brained. Toy arrived in pristine condition wrapped in plastic. A+.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. She loves Pusheen and has several in her collection.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Strunk

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as birthday present for my neice. It was her favorite gift!! Totally as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Egner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a big fan of Pusheen and this little guy really made her birthday extra special!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft, great for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft, great for a my 2 year old niece. Sweet decorative pillow looks great in a crib, bed or rocking chair. Also sweet for her to carry around and snuggle with. Bought it for myself just as much for her bc it's so cute! 💗💜💙💛💖🦄
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The plush is of great quality. My daughter loves it. She sleeps with it and says it's really soft.
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR

customer_reviews.title: Famous Pusheen stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.text: Pusheen stuffed animals are very popular. There’s so many kinds it makes it hard to pick one out. Great gift for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Bought one on sale during Prime Day and I'm happy to say it was made from very soft material, not lumpy or lopsided, and the mane was not scraggly or shedding, as some reviewers noted. That would probably indicate it was fake. Personally I do feel it is on the small side, and I would not buy it at its full price, thought that could just be because I am used to buying from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Alice L.

customer_reviews.title: My Spirit Animal: Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: Pusheeen, Pusheeeen, she's the All-American dreeeam! Attitude à la Garfield but approximately a billion times cuter (conservative estimate).
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Pusheenicorn
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old, who loves unicorns! This was definitely no different...she loves it! So soft, small enough to carry around and just so cute!
customer_reviews.author: YML88

customer_reviews.title: She loved pusheen as an emoji
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a christmas present for my 9 year old daughter. She loved pusheen as an emoji. She had no idea their were pusheen plushies and was very excited when she opened this for christmas. The colors are bright and fun. Material is soft and makes a great pillow or snuggly animal for nap time, bed time or relax time. Looking forward to collecting more adorable pusheen plushies.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: These are all the rage with girls this year. They are pretty cute and soft. Got this for my daughters 10th birthday. she will be so excited! Also the prices here is better than in Clair'es which is the only other place I've been able to find them!
customer_reviews.author: The Aitch

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture! It was packaged well, and the price was a lot cheaper than I saw in the store. Delivered as expected! My daughter is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My little girl LOVES IT. It’s really cute and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jillana

customer_reviews.title: PUSHEEN FIRST OF HER NAME
customer_reviews.text: Pusheen is a lifestyle. And this plush Pusheenicorn is as high quality as the creature it's representing. My 10-yr old daughter loves it, but it's mine so she can buy her own.
customer_reviews.author: Capricornicopia

customer_reviews.title: Nice !
customer_reviews.text: Very cute unicorn stuffed animal ! Great price and very cute.....Get this for my granddaughter for her birthday's gift. She love it so much. Very pleased with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: nwklee

customer_reviews.title: Unicorns + Pusheen = ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: If you (or your kid) like Pusheen and unicorns, you need this. It's adorable and soft. Makes for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This was a very important post-glass of wine purchase and I regret nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Calli

customer_reviews.title: GUND Pusheenicorn Unicorn Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Gift for my nephew was a Hit .. Pusheen Has lots of collectibles. Great Rainbow mane. Made Very Good , with Quality soft velveteen material.
customer_reviews.author: donnie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the size. I paid 13.99 for a Pusheen KEYCHAIN at a chain retailer. This was only a few more dollars for a full sized plush. Has survived my 8 year old so far.
customer_reviews.author: Megan jones

customer_reviews.title: The adorableness will make you melt
customer_reviews.text: I have her chilling next to my artist Pikachu plush from the Pokémon Center and she is just so cute! Super soft and squishy and fat, I knew what to expect because I saw her in store before buying. Just be sure to fluff her once you take her out of the protective plastic bag :)
customer_reviews.author: SerenitasTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen+Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. My 3 year old daughter loves unicorns and pusheen, when we saw pusheenicorn, it was perfect! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cilla

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pusheen plush
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift so the recipient has not opened it yet, but after looking over it seems like something that will be used quite frequently.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfThree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter will love it so much. The package arrived on time and good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Mosso

customer_reviews.title: Is it a cat? I am not sure.
customer_reviews.text: Just like my other posts about the Pusheen. my daughter loves these things. Not sure what they are. Is the name of the thing a Pusheen or is that were they are from... I have no Idea. Good Quality and for the price for something that is popular is to be expected and not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Catchphrase33

customer_reviews.title: It’s a stuffed toy
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for a toy smaller than a loaf of bread... but my daughter loved it for a week before giving it to our dog to destroy
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute!! Color was a little lighter gray than the picture, but doesn't take away from the pusheen unicorn cuteness!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is in love
customer_reviews.text: This is actually larger than I expected - and my daughter is over the moon with it. Very nicely out together and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: K. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this stuffed toy. Very soft, but firm enough for use as a pillow. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Medium size but made well
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves stuff animals especially the cat which she has different ones in smaller sizes thought this would be a hit she loved it
customer_reviews.author: angela mateo

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to anyone who likes cats and unicorns
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery. Very soft and cuddly. I recommend this to anyone who likes cats and unicorns. Pusheen always puts me in a good mood. I like to keep him by my study chair so that I can have him handy in case I need a pick me up. Very cuddly and adorable. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Olson

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this Pusheenicorn! She's a big fan of this adorable kitty, and especially loved the unicorn version. Great quality and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Hoop Mama

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft & Plushy Animal
customer_reviews.text: The plush came in a plastic bag and was in great condition. It's very soft to touch and makes it feel good to pet (very therapeutic!). Colors are vibrant and looks just like the picture shown. This turned out to be a great gift for my nieces who are 4 and 7.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Want to recommend to more friends, really worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Toys are of good quality, unless someone forcibly pulls the tail or hair and gives it to a child as a birthday present. I think this is the most lovely rainbow Unicorn! I'll buy it later. It feels very soft.I hope she will love it as much as she grows up。
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shindler

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Poor construction. Obviously a knock-off & not a very good one at that. Wish mine looked as good as the picture. :(
customer_reviews.author: T. Cheek

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw that this as a lightning deal and couldn't resist! I love unicorns and Pusheen, so of course I LOVE Pusheenicorn!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Y.

customer_reviews.title: PUSHEEN
customer_reviews.text: Who would have known this little cat would drive my 9yr old neice crazy!! great little gift for good grades
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My kids love everything pusheen and we’re excited to get this. It’s soft and cute. I just wish they weren’t quite so expensive but if you wait for a good deal you can at least get it a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Unicorn Pusheen! Somehow it was 10 more dollars cheaper on amazon than offline. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stella Oh

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, good size, and decent quality. It gets five stars because it fits what I wanted it to be. It's not a beautiful, hand-crafted work of art type plushie, but it is a unicorn pusheen plushie of fair quality. I purchased this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift since we often send pusheen emojis back and forth and have an inside joke about this one. If a decent-quality unicorn pusheen plushie is what you're looking for look no further. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: ... think this product is so cute I was so happy to get it until I seen how small it ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is so cute I was so happy to get it until I seen how small it was for the price I had purchased another one at Christmas time that was only $12 and it was twice as big as this it is made well and cute and adorable but not for the price it should have been a lot bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter is obsessed with this adorable unicorn Pusheen plush!❤ She loves it and just got it yesterday and it's already displayed on her bed as well as many other cute pusheen items! In my Opinion this plush/character is a great gift for all ages! There is no way we are taking back this flawless plush! I love it's pastel colors and its unicorn horn! So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: she loves it as Pusheen is a well loved cutesy internet character AND this one is a unicorn
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's 13th birthday... she loves it as Pusheen is a well loved cutesy internet character AND this one is a unicorn. It's not round, but more the width of a binder... it's firm but really soft and still good for cuddling and displaying.
customer_reviews.author: Mind Malady

customer_reviews.title: Cute enough to pay that price
customer_reviews.text: So overpriced but my niece loves it and it is adorable and very soft.

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my granddaughter... I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter...I have no idea what this is or where it came from...she, however, loves it!! And loves me for getting it for her birthday...

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for daughter she adores it!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for daughter she adores it! Strangely though the last puff of pink hair on Pusheen different slightly rougher texture and didn't fair well in washer lol kinda has a dread now lol

customer_reviews.title: mom loved it
customer_reviews.text: got this for a gift for my mom, very soft and plush!

customer_reviews.text: What more can you say about a Caticorn!! My granddaughter loves this and sleeps with it daily. Perfect size for a 6 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squishy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter for her Rainbow Unicorn themed birthday. She loves it!

customer_reviews.title: This is very soft and sweet. My 8 year old daughter loves Pusheen

customer_reviews.text: I did a cat/unicorn theme for my daughter's Easter basket this year. Three months later and it is still going strong. Great quality and EXTREMELY SOFT

customer_reviews.title: This pusheen is pretty awesome. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This pusheen is pretty awesome. My daughter loves it. It is pretty good size, about 13 inches in length. Worth the ~$15.

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable! I made sure it was authentic GUND
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! I made sure it was authentic GUND. It's for my niece's birthday and she will love it. I got her the Pusheen mermaid last year and that was also top quality

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has slept with this every night since she got it

customer_reviews.title: What's there to complain about when it comes to Pusheen?
customer_reviews.text: Basically, product was as advertised and listed. It arrived in a sealed plastic bag, so that's always a good thing, being the neat, clean, germ-a-phobic that I yam. Niece loved this unicorn Pusheen, so it was win-win. Meow.

customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my 5 year old daughter! It’s like a mini pillow, and looks just like the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Weird whiskers, but love it
customer_reviews.text: This pusheenicorn is so cute and huggable, I just can't get enough of it! My only critique of it would be that the whiskers are put on strangely. They stick up at random angles, and they're not separate at the base like they should be. But those are small details. Otherwise, love it!

customer_reviews.text: came in good condition it was a gift she loved it

customer_reviews.title: High quality Pusheen, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pusheens. I have one and I bought this one for my sister. She also loves it! Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Afton

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Total hit with my daughter! Larger than expected and just as CUTE as can be! Love how soft it was and can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: P. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and snuggly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Also, these pusheen animals wash really well. My daughter loves it and takes it around so it's nice it doesn't look bad after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Momovgirls

product_meta.title: GUND Pusheenicorn Plush Stuffed Animal Rainbow Cat Unicorn, 13"
product_meta.description: Pusheen is the snack-loving cat who loves to go on adventures with friends like Sloth, Stormy, Pip and Cheek in her popular webcomic with over 10 million social media fans! This 13" plush brings the bright and beautiful Pusheenicorn to life! Features a colorful rainbow mane and tail as well as a sparkly unicorn horn.
feature_bullets: Pusheen is the snack-loving cat who loves to go on adventures with friends like Sloth, Stormy, Pip and Cheek in her popular webcomic with over 10 million social media fans! This 13" plush brings the bright and beautiful Pusheenicorn to life! Features a colorful rainbow mane and tail as well as a sparkly unicorn horn.
PUSHEEN + UNICORN = PUSHEENICORN: This 13" plush brings the bright and beautiful Pusheenicorn to life! Features a colorful rainbow mane and tail as well as a sparkly unicorn horn.
SOFT & HUGGABLE: Made from a soft, huggable material that meets famous GUND quality standards, these slippers feature surface-washable construction for easy cleaning. Appropriate for ages 1 & up.
THE PERFECT GIFT: Our plush dolls, teddy bears & stuffed animals make perfect gifts for birthdays, baby showers, baptisms, Easter, Valentine's Day & more! A perfect gift for any Pusheen or cat lover!
QUALITY CUDDLES: Known for our huggable plush designs & gifts, our award-winning bears & toys appeal to all ages from infants & toddlers to adults. They're perfect for play, collecting & cuddling.
